channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Democrats Huff About Trump’s DOJ Hours After Revelations Show Biden Agents Spied On Senators
item.description: Democrat timing is disingenuous, coming a day after evidence that former President Joe Biden used the FBI to spy on Republicans senators.

item.title: Senate confirms 107 more Trump nominees, clearing bulk of backlog

item.title: Students Are ‘Learning with Their Feet’ — by Shunning Bad Colleges
item.description: Students are reshaping the higher education market by abandoning low-ranking schools and low-earning majors.

item.title: A Comedy Festival in Saudi Arabia Is Fundamentally Unfunny — and Unfree
item.description: What message does it send that American comedians are neutering their sets at the behest of a foreign frenemy?

item.title: No, Obamacare Premiums Are Not Doubling
item.description: Contrary to Marjorie Taylor Greene’s claim, most of the Obamacare subsidies are not expiring, for good or for ill.

item.title: Supreme Court hears challenge over mail-in balloting out of Illinois

item.title: Concordia University Wisconsin Gives Christian Colleges A Bad Name
item.description: In the wake of Charlie Kirk’s assassination, Concordia's first response was to prevent a TPUSA chapter from being recognized on campus.

item.title: Greta’s Gaza Flotilla Fantasy
item.description: The Swedish activist’s latest odyssey will hopefully be her last.

item.title: Davis: The Government And Big Tech Censored Americans. It Must Never Happen Again
item.description: 'It is time to return to a world where we can say what we wish without fear of being censored, or deplatformed, or shot dead'

item.title: Good Luck to Bari Weiss at CBS
item.description: The legacy media have lost the trust of the public and are in dire need of reform.
